price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߧߋ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߓߊ߬ߕߏ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߒ ߣߊߡߎ߲ ߓߎ߰ߓߎ߯ ߊ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعۡبُدُ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُۥ دِينِي

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: quli al-laha aʿbudu mukh'liṣan lahu dīnī
